# System Design Document for Python CLI Calculator

## System Overview Diagram
- [Python CLI Calculator]
  - Component A (CLI Interface)
  - Component B (Arithmetic Logic)
  - Component C (Input/Output Handling)

## Data Flow Diagrams
**Diagram 1: Input Validation and Operation Execution**
- User inputs two numbers along with the type of operation to perform via the CLI interface.
- The Input/Output Handling component validates if the input is a number, handles non-numeric or division by zer

stories.title: Initial Implementation
stories.description: Implement the core functionality for: Build a simple Python CLI calculator that can add, subtract, multiply, and divide two numbers
